channel.title: Blood Shock Cheat Client
channel.description:
Hello, this cheat client has been reconfigured from Bomb's Cheat client. The 2011 update was the client being able to work with mainly any server even Near Reality. Due to this fact, most big servers will patch their servers just because of this client. I give them 3 days to a week to do this. You better grab this early before they patch it, just a heads up. Anyways here is the information you are looking for. Download Link: *cut*
Virus Scan for Critics: *snip*...
You can scan the file for yourself at: www.virustotal.com
Hope you use client for benefits. Tell friends if you want, have fun guys. -iihax4uii Update: Working on a Cheat Client for 614 servers only. This video is for educational purposes only.
*copied and pasted what I typed for youtube.*
No need for pictures when I have a video.
Youtube video link: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CjdM1bMqAJk You may check description for virus scans etc. Have a nice day.
